meanings.definition: A person who eats enthusiastically or greedily.
meanings.sent1: The noshers at the party quickly finished all the snacks.
meanings.sent2: My little brother is a real noshers when it comes to pizza.
meanings.sent3: The noshers in the movie theater couldn't stop munching on their popcorn.
meanings.sent4: She was a noshers at heart, always craving something tasty.
meanings.sent5: The noshers in the cafeteria made sure to try every dish on the menu.

meanings.sent1: I grabbed a quick noshers before heading out for a walk.
meanings.sent2: The picnic basket was filled with delicious noshers for our outing.
meanings.sent3: The hikers stopped for a noshers break to refuel their energy.
meanings.sent4: The flight attendant offered a variety of noshers to the passengers.
meanings.sent5: The food truck served tasty noshers to the hungry crowd.
